text: Ezɨ gumazamiziba kamaghɨn Sol mɨgei, “Nɨ oragh. Jonatan Israelia en akurazɨ, e mɨdorozir ekiar kam gafira. A ti aremegham, a? Bar puvatɨgham. E Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziamɨn guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, nɨ bizir kuratamɨn a damuan markɨ. God an akurazɨ, a bizir kam gami.” Kamagh amizɨ, gumazamiziba ua Jonatan inizɨma, Sol a mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir puvatɨ.
